de.moritzbruder.gameoflife.game

Class Field

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.moritzbruder.gameoflife.game.Field

  • public class Field
extends java.lang.Object
    An Object representing a game-field for Convway's Game of Life
    Author:
    Created by Moritz Bruder on 15.09.2017.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  Field.OnFieldChangedListener
      Listener that is notified when any changes happened (To repaint for example)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int currentlyAliveCount
      Contains how many of all cells on the Field are currently alive.
      static int DEFAULT_HEIGHT 
      static int DEFAULT_WIDTH 
      private Cell[][] field
      2-dimensional array holding all cells on the Field by x- and y-coordinate
      private int height
      Contains the current height of the Field
      private java.lang.Object key
      Holds an empty Object that serves as a key, to make sure that cells of the Field are never modified without the Field's knowledge
      private Field.OnFieldChangedListener onChangeListener
      Holds the listener that listens for changes on this field
      private int width
      Contains the current width of the Field

        Creates a new Field-instance

        height - number of rows

    • Method Detail

      • makeField

        private Cell[][] makeField(int width,
                           int height)
        Generates the 2d-array representing the field, while keeping the state of the cells as far as possible
        Parameters:
        width - number of columns on the field
        height - number of rows on the field
        Returns:
        the 2d array of cells

      • resize

        public void resize(int width,
                   int height)
        Changes width and height of the field, reinitializes array
        Parameters:
        width - The new desired width
        height - The new desired height

      • getCell

        public Cell getCell(int x,
                    int y)
        Returns the cell with the given coordinates
        Parameters:
        x - The x-Position of the requested cell. Allowed values: -1 to field-width
        y - The y-Position of the requested cell. Allowed values: -1 to field-height
        Returns:
        the cell

      • getCell

        public Cell getCell(Cell.Position position)
        Returns the cell at the given position
        Parameters:
        position - Position representing the coords of the required cell
        Returns:
        the cell

      • getWidth

        public int getWidth()
        Returns:
        The current width of the Field

      • getHeight

        public int getHeight()
        Returns:
        The current height of the Field

      • getCellCount

        public int getCellCount()
        Returns:
        The total count of Cells on the Field

      • getAliveCellCount

        public int getAliveCellCount()
        Returns:
        The count of Cells on the Field that are alive

      • nextRound

        public boolean nextRound()
        Triggers the calculation of the following states for each cell. Iterates through all cells to calculate and then again to commit and draw
        Returns:
        whether there happened any true changes in this step

      • forEach

        public void forEach(java.util.function.Consumer<Cell> consumer)
        Executes a bit of code on every single Cell
        Parameters:
        consumer - The Consumer consuming every Cell

      • killCell

        public void killCell(Cell c)
        Changes the state of the given cell to dead
        Parameters:
        c - The Cell that shall be killed

      • makeCellComeAlive

        public void makeCellComeAlive(Cell c)
        Changes the state of the given cell to alive
        Parameters:
        c - The Cell that shall become alive

      • subscribe

        public void subscribe(Field.OnFieldChangedListener delegate)
        Used to subscribe a Field.OnFieldChangedListener to any changes made to the field.
        Parameters:
        delegate - the onChangeListener to subscribe
